DOC.HEADLINE: PARENTS GIVE SCHOOL DISTRICT TOP GRADES
DOC.TEXT: A survey of parents in the Placentia-Yorba Linda Unified School District shows that most are happy with the school district and would give their child ' s school an A or a B . District officials sent a 23-question survey to every family in the district last spring.Of about 15 # 000 surveys mailed , 5 # 700 were returned , officials said . More_than 80 % of the respondents gave the schools an A or B grade , with another 14 % saying the schools are doing just a satisfactory job . Parents were also asked to respond to questions about school and staff performance , academic standards and schools ' relationships with families . DANIELLE A . FOUQUETTE
